trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows button control, which reacts to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 按鈕控制項，此控制項會反應 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> class inherits directly from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>類別直接繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別。

trans-unit.source: **Content Model:** <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: **內容模型：** <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: Its content property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 其內容的屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to respond when the user clicks a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件回應，當使用者按一下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>方法標記<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>為已處理的事件。

trans-unit.source: To respond to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event, attach an event handler to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> event, or call <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29> with `handledEventsToo` set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要回應<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>事件，附加事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>事件或呼叫<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%28System.Windows.RoutedEvent%2CSystem.Delegate%2CSystem.Boolean%29>與`handledEventsToo`設`true`。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Button Control
trans-unit.target: 自訂按鈕控制項

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>控制項，可使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, see [Button Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/button-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，請參閱[按鈕樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/button-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows three buttons that respond to clicks in three different ways.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範三種不同的方式回應按一下動作的三個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Hover: the first button changes colors when the user hovers with the mouse over the button.
trans-unit.target: 暫留： 第一個按鈕色彩時變更使用者的滑鼠停留在按鈕上。

trans-unit.source: Press: the second button requires that the mouse be pressed while the mouse pointer is over the button.
trans-unit.target: 按下:，滑鼠指標停留在按鈕時，會按下滑鼠需要第二個按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Release: the third does not reset the background color of the buttons until the mouse is pressed and released on the button.
trans-unit.target: 發行： 第三個直到按下滑鼠並發行 5d; 按鈕，不會重設按鈕的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> is a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> 是否為 [取消] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A user can activate the Cancel button by pressing the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: 使用者按一下 ESC 鍵，就可以啟用 [取消] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> is a Cancel button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> 是 [取消] 按鈕，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsCancel%2A> property of a button to `true`, you create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is registered with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsCancel%2A>按鈕屬性`true`，您建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，向<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>。

trans-unit.source: The button is then activated when a user presses the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下 ESC 鍵，然後會啟動按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use this property to create a Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何使用這個屬性來建立 [取消] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsCancel" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsCancel" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> is the default button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> 是否為預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: A user invokes the default button by pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可按 ENTER 鍵來叫用預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> is the default button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> 是預設按鈕，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault%2A> property of a button to `true`, you register the button with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> so that a user can invoke the button by pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault%2A>按鈕屬性`true`，註冊按鈕的<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>，讓使用者可以叫用按鈕按下 ENTER 鍵。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to specify a button as the default button.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何將按鈕指定為預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> is the button that is activated when a user presses ENTER.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> 按鈕是否可在使用者按下 ENTER 鍵時啟動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the button is activated when the user presses ENTER; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果該按鈕可在使用者按下 ENTER 鍵時啟動，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A> property is `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault%2A> property is set to `true` and the control that has focus does not accept ENTER as input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A>屬性是`true`時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault%2A>屬性設定為`true`而且具有焦點的控制項不接受輸入做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the **Run** dialog box, the **OK** button is the default button.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在**執行**對話方塊中，**確定**按鈕是預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: When focus is on the text box, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A> on the **OK** button is `true` because a user can activate the button by pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: 在文字方塊中，焦點時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A>上**確定**按鈕`true`因為使用者可以藉由按下 ENTER 啟動按鈕。

trans-unit.source: If the default button has focus, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果預設按鈕具有焦點，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This is because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A> method handles ENTER, and it is not necessary for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A> to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>方法會處理輸入，並不需要<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A>設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A> property is `true` for a default button.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何判斷是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted%2A>屬性是`true`預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefaulted" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Button.IsDefault" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Called when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" /> 時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Creates an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ButtonAutomationPeer" /> for this control as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 為這個控制項建立適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ButtonAutomationPeer" />，以做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ButtonAutomationPeer" /> for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ButtonAutomationPeer" />。
